root.text: The most important functions of the CPU in a computer is to perform logical operations by utilizing hardware and software. But, how these hardware and software perform such operations is a mysterious puzzle. In order to have a better understanding of such a complex issue, we must have to acquaint ourselves with the Boolean Logic. If you are an ardent follower of Boolean Algebra and Digital electronics , then “LOGIQUE HEIST” is your kind of adventure!

text: Time limit will be strictly adhered to.
Usage of internet is strictly prohibited.
The decision of the judges will be final.

root.text: This round will test the knowledge of the participants about logic gates in the form of MCQ. Each team will have to solve a set of 30 questions. It is an eliminative round.

The shortlisted teams will have to solve the complex Boolean circuits and should also design a circuit for a given real time problem within the given time constraint and for circuit design usage of software is not allowed.
